title: What ruler or empire ruled the most land in history? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would like to mention 2 great conquerors who ruled on earth magnificently Alexander the GreatUmar Farooq of ArabiaAlexander conquered 18,00,000 square miles area with a strong and organized army during his 10 years kingdom. While, Umar Farooq managed to rule on over 22,00,000 square miles area without any trained army during 10 Years. This Included Rome and Iran which were the superpowers of that time.
